Author: kittypandaprincess
Text: Yes. Especially with newer anime and the extreme fan service. My husband calls me his waifu but I still feel disgusting when I see anime/manga now.

Author: sadgirlhrs
Text: you’re not alone. my ex was really into anime and would talk about waifus with his friends and followed a lot of female cosplayers on instagram. made me feel like shit LOL. thanks to my ED, it’s impossible for me to enjoy anime like i used to. it’s really sad. :/
